name: Duke Walk
overview:
Mission : Get Ride Of http, :, //, ., ., ., com and /

What: DukeWalk is a very simple Domain Name server where the registered names can be typed in a web browser search area box to visit a web site. User don’t need to type things like http://..com/, DukeWalk lets you to register simple unique unicode words from any language as Duke Walk Domain ID.

Why: We provide free domain registration. You don’t need to handle http, :,//,etc. We removed many complexities of DNS and we just provide the solution that helps browsers to go to web sites. DNS is used for many purpose in computer world, we just simplified and customized it for browser navigation.

How: We don’t use DNS servers for name resolution. When you type the unique name in a browser search box, it goes to the Duke Walk web server and DukeWalk redirects the browser to correct URL. If user types words wrongly, we provide suggestions like search engine web sites.

Who:Any web site owners can register unique Duke Walk IDs for different language users using simple words. Individual can register thier blogs, albums, social network or frequent visiting URLs to get unique IDs. Duke Walk is not an official Domain Name registrar, but we provides many useful features on top of DNS.
